hero.title: Create your online store with Shopify
hero.description: Transform your e-commerce vision into reality with our Shopify expertise. We create high-performance, aesthetic and conversion-optimized online stores.

custom-design.title: Custom design
custom-design.description: Creation of a unique theme that reflects your brand and optimizes user experience.

conversion-optimization.title: Conversion optimization
conversion-optimization.description: Implementation of best practices to maximize your sales and retain your customers.

enhanced-security.title: Enhanced security
enhanced-security.description: Protection of your data and your customers' data with the latest security standards.

advanced-integrations.title: Advanced integrations
advanced-integrations.description: Connection with your favorite tools for inventory management, accounting and marketing.

secure-payments.title: Secure payments
secure-payments.description: Integration of major payment methods and secure transaction management.

international-by-default.title: International by default
international-by-default.description: Sell worldwide with multi-currency management and automatic translations.

powerful-analytics.title: Powerful analytics
powerful-analytics.description: Detailed tracking of your performance and insights to optimize your sales.

simplified-logistics.title: Simplified logistics
simplified-logistics.description: Efficient order management and integration with major carriers.

creation-timeline.question: How long does it take to create a Shopify store?
creation-timeline.answer: The average time to create a Shopify store varies from 4 to 8 weeks, depending on project complexity. This includes the design phase, development, product integration and testing.

migration.question: Can you migrate my existing store to Shopify?
migration.answer: Yes, we offer a complete migration service from your existing store to Shopify, including transfer of products, customers and orders, while ensuring a smooth transition.

customization-types.question: What types of customization do you offer?
customization-types.answer: We offer complete customization of your Shopify store: custom design, custom features, specific integrations, and mobile optimization.

post-launch-support.question: Do you offer post-launch support?
post-launch-support.answer: Yes, we offer several support and maintenance plans to ensure the smooth operation of your store after launch, including updates, optimizations and technical support.

security.question: How do you ensure the security of my store?
security.answer: We implement security best practices: SSL, PCI DSS compliance, regular backups, and fraud protection. Shopify also provides bank-level security for all transactions.

seo.title: SEO

digital-marketing.title: Digital marketing
digital-marketing.description: Marketing strategies adapted to attract and convert more customers.

training.description: Complete training to manage your store independently.
